name: Dismute
description: Dismute is a casual-arcade game which appeals to gamers who are seeking for a fun experience. Dismute’s interface is simple. In the game, red squares roam around the screen. Your job is to dodge these red squares. If they touch you or if you run into them, the game is over and your final score would be displayed. Try to survive for as long as possible! This game is fun and challenging at the same time! As the levels progress, so does the difficulty. Challenge your friends and compare each other's high scores to see who's better.  You can create your own mini tournament between your friends if you want!
